column5: I always knew they liked donuts - https://www.foxnews.com/food-drink/cops-grieve-krispy-kreme-doughnuts-lost-in-nye-truck-fire-no-words
I tried to eat one once but it kept slipping from my grasp, complete disgusting blob of flour and grease.Â  Never again.

I can't stomach them either Fisherman. I couldn't wait to have one and I was so disappointed. Didn't even finish it. I can't imagine how much sugar was in it. Those pics are cool JoPa. Is it just me but the new generation of Law Enforcement seem to have chilled since I was younger . Even when interviewed now they speak like normal people unlike the military like verbiage stone faced they used 30 years ago. Very polite as well now, it wasn't always that way. Maybe it's all the cameras on them.
I heard the truck caught fire while doing a donut
